sentences.en: A: Dedication, fraternal love, mutual aid and progress.
sentences.cn: 答: 奉献 、 友爱 、 互助、进步.

sentences.en: B . Fraternal Twins Fetuses may be of different sex.
sentences.cn: 异卵双胞胎可能性别不同.

sentences.en: Begin with filial piety and fraternal love , and then see and hear.
sentences.cn: 人生的首要大事是孝敬父母,尊敬兄长,其次是多实践于天下大事, 博闻古今之理.

sentences.en: China has long had a fraught relationship with its fraternal neighbour.
sentences.cn: 长期以来,中国与这个兄弟邻国的关系一直令人担忧.

sentences.en: Derived from two separately fertilized eggs . Used especially of fraternal twins.
sentences.cn: 二卵双胞胎是源于两个分开的受精卵的.

sentences.en: Fraternal love, sometimes almost everything , is at others worse than nothing.
sentences.cn: 骨肉之间的爱有时是胜过一切.有时是一文不值.
工会成员兄弟般的团结

sentences.en: It was a little singular he should sacrifice his fraternal feeling to his curiosity.
sentences.cn: 他为了好奇,甘愿牺牲兄弟的情谊,未免有些特别.

sentences.en: It'seems to me that he grew more erect as the fraternal hilarity increased.
sentences.cn: 我觉得随着沆瀣一气的欢闹的高涨,他也变得越发端庄了.

sentences.en: Men from the fraternal order will staff the soup kitchen today.
sentences.cn: 共济会的人今天将会在施舍处帮忙.

sentences.en: Moreover, the system sets a good example to fraternal colleges in Yunnan.
sentences.cn: 此外, 该系统也为云南省各兄弟院校实施网络辅导答疑起到抛砖引玉的作用.
请接受我们兄弟般的帮助吧!

sentences.en: Shall we apply to fraternal factories for help?
sentences.cn: 我们是否应要求兄弟厂支援?

sentences.en: We sent our fraternal greetings to the conference.
sentences.cn: 我们向会议致以友好的问候.

sentences.en: Welcome Web site and various fraternal exchange Site Links, and common development.
sentences.cn: 欢迎各兄弟网站与本站交换友情链接, 共同发展.

杀害兄弟者；杀兄弟的行为

trans.tran_cn: 兄弟的，兄弟般的，友好的，同志般的
trans.tran_en: showing a special friendliness to other people because you share interests or ideas with them
